A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a poor example of what a Star Wars film should be. The film executes its story poorly\, not giving reason to character actions and making the entire list of characters act like fools. Once again\, just like its predecessor\, there is NO explanation for why characters are written the way they are. That is the epitome of poor writing. It is a pretty movie. However\, any pile of trash can be dressed up to look good\, but there will still be an underlying smell of garbage.
